items.sentence: Tom and Mary are giving a party on Friday night.
Tom still doesn\'t know who\'s going to do that.
Tom made me do some things I didn\'t want to do.
An old man was at the gate checking the tickets.
Tom never asked Mary to show him how to do that.
I\'ll do everything that you\'ve asked me to do.
Even Tom wouldn\'t be stupid enough to eat that.
Tom gently took Mary\'s hands and squeezed them.
I believe you have information that can help us.
I\'m telling you this because you\'re my friend.
